title: Blondy's Very First Birthday
backCoverBlurb: It's Blondy's first birthday! Join her for a day of bright balloons, sweet cake, and lots of love from her family in this joyful celebration.
characterDescription: A young girl with curly, light blonde hair and bright blue eyes. She has a wide, happy and energetic smile. She is wearing a bright red t-shirt under blue denim overalls.

pages.text: Today is a big day. Blondy is turning one! Can you clap your hands? Yay!
pages.imagePrompt: A young girl with curly, light blonde hair and bright blue eyes. Blondy is wearing a bright red t-shirt under blue denim overalls and is clapping her hands with a huge, happy smile.

pages.text: Look at the balloons. Pop! They are red and blue. Point to the red one.
pages.imagePrompt: A young girl with curly, light blonde hair and bright blue eyes. Blondy is pointing at a bunch of bright red and blue balloons tied to her high chair. The room is sunny and decorated.

pages.text: Her family is here. They sing a song. Happy Birthday, Blondy! they say.
pages.imagePrompt: A young girl with curly, light blonde hair and bright blue eyes. Blondy's family is gathered around her, singing and smiling as she looks at them with wide, joyful eyes.

pages.text: There is a big, yummy cake. It has one golden candle. Sparkle, sparkle!
pages.imagePrompt: A young girl with curly, light blonde hair and bright blue eyes. A close-up of a delicious birthday cake with frosting and a single glowing golden candle. Blondy looks at it in wonder.

pages.text: Blondy takes a little bite. Mmmm! The cake is so sweet and soft.
pages.imagePrompt: A young girl with curly, light blonde hair and bright blue eyes. Blondy has a tiny bit of cake on her finger and is tasting it, look surprised and delighted.

pages.text: She opens a present. It is a bumpy ball! Boing, boing, it goes.
pages.imagePrompt: A young girl with curly, light blonde hair and bright blue eyes. Blondy is holding a colorful, bumpy sensory ball and looking at it curiously.

pages.text: Blondy plays with her new toys. Everything feels so exciting and fun!
pages.imagePrompt: A young girl with curly, light blonde hair and bright blue eyes. Blondy is sitting on a soft rug, surrounded by new blocks and a plush bear, laughing happily.

pages.text: The party is full of big smiles and warm hugs. May is so happy.
pages.imagePrompt: A young girl with curly, light blonde hair and bright blue eyes. Blondy's mommy is giving her a gentle hug, and Blondy's blue eyes are sparkling with joy.

pages.text: Now the sun is going down. The room feels quiet and calm. Shhh...
pages.imagePrompt: A young girl with curly, light blonde hair and bright blue eyes. The evening sun is casting warm, long shadows in the room where Blondy is sitting peacefully.

pages.text: Blondy is a big girl now. She is one year old today. Wave bye-bye!
pages.imagePrompt: A young girl with curly, light blonde hair and bright blue eyes. Blondy is waving her hand at the camera with a sweet, tired smile.

pages.text: She cuddles her soft bear. It feels so fluffy and warm in her bed.
pages.imagePrompt: A young girl with curly, light blonde hair and bright blue eyes. Blondy is lying in her crib, hugging a soft brown bear and looking very sleepy.

pages.text: Goodnight, Blondy. Sweet dreams after your very first birthday. Sleep tight.
pages.imagePrompt: A young girl with curly, light blonde hair and bright blue eyes. A peaceful close-up of Blondy sleeping soundly, looking empowered and safe.
